About

Hi, my name is Son Pham. I'm an international student from Vietnam. Here's a brief timeline of my life journey:
[01-17] : Had a wonderful time with my family in Vietnam.
[17-18] : Joined Lutheran highschool, where I met great people such as Ms. Beyer and Mr. Meyer.
[18-21] : Went to Southwestern College
[21-24] : Joined a couple of clubs at San Diego State University and met people from different walks of life. Also worked at a company for the first time.
Continue learning new skills: JavaScript, Angularjs, Bash, Shell, Perlâ€¦
[24-25] : Left my job at Samsung and kept learning to find a more challenging one.
[25-27] : Took a few quiet years to live.
[28] : Went back to school again!!
That's a quick summary of my life so far. I'm excited to see what the future holds!
